content.rendered:
Directed by Sriram Raghavan.

Written by Sriram Raghavan. Arijit Biswas. Pooja Ladha Surti.

Cast Varun Dhawan(Raghav Purohit). Nawazuddin Siddiqui(Liak Tungekar). Yami Gautam(Misha). Huma Qureshi(Jhimli). Neel Tyagi(Robin). Vinay Pathak(Harman). Radhika Apte(Kanchan). Pratima Kazmi(Liak’s Mother (as Pratima Kannan)). Divya Dutta(Shobha). Aamir Naik(Special appearance). Kumud Mishra(Govind Mishra). Ashwini Kalsekar(Detective R. Joshi). Murli Sharma(Michael). Zakir Hussain(Patil). Avishek Lama(Commercial Model) .Shashikant Gupta. Amir Malik(Varun’s office colleague Romy singh). Mukesh Marko(Rahul (voice)). Nileshpatelxyz(Nizam friend). Anuschka Sawhney(Imli). Deependra Singh(Faisal Khan). Gopal Singh(Sub Inspector Khanolkar). Pawan Singh(Pawan)

Language Hindi.

Producers Murshid Akhtar. Vishal Bajaj. Saif Ali Khan. Dinesh Vijan.

Production Eros Worldwide. Maddock Films.
